finalBlock.title: Contactless In-app Payment
finalBlock.description: Download the Electrify America mobile app to pay for your charging session right from your phone.

postLists.title: BECOME A MEMBER
postLists.description: Need to fill up on the road? Enjoy discounted pricing with our Pass+ monthly subscription plan.

postLists.title: RENEWABLE ENERGY & SUSTAINABILITY
postLists.description: We invest in renewable energy solutions like solar EV chargers in our effort to lower our energy-related emissions overall and improve your EV charging experience.

postLists.title: MOBILE APP
postLists.description: Find stations, start charging, track and end your session from your smartphone with our app for iOS and Android.

postLists.title: HOME PRODUCTS
postLists.description: Simplify life with HomeStationTM. Our Level 2 EV home charger offers remote start, stop, and scheduling via the Electrify America app for a streamlined charging experience.

postLists.title: SUPPORT & TROUBLESHOOTING
postLists.description: Have a question or issue with a charging station? Our team is here to help. Call us at 1-833-632-2778 or use our contact form.
